speaker.whotheyare: Crystal, also known as Tom, Rasmussen grew up working class in North West England, where they learned the art of drag from the legendary women who raised them.
speaker.whylisten:
Crystal, AKA Tom, Rasmussen moved to London to find fame and fortune but instead found a group of radical queers who would become their chosen family. They have written two books -- Diary of a Drag Queen and First Comes Love -- both of which are being adapted for screen.

They live in a commune in South London with six others and their dog, Celine Dion.
